name: Doctor Who Infinity
description: Brought to you by the teams behind the award-winning Doctor Who: Legacy game. This is an innovative new platform for telling original Doctor Who stories. Written, drawn, and narrated by incredible talent mixed with a unique take on tile puzzle gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core i3 2Ghz and above Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS250/Radeon HD5750 Storage: 15 GB available space
